predicate.note: Frames file for 'quantify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with count, loosely.

example.name: just transitive
example.text: ``We can not quantify the total adverse effects of Hugo,'' said Edwin Colodny, chairman and president of USAir Group.
example.arg: the total adverse effects of Hugo
